TopicTitle: I think, my savegame got corrupted

Articles.Content:
KSP/Windows:

KSP 0.90 32 bit (steam version)

Windows 7 home premium 64bit (german version)

(more info in logfiles)

Problem:

Can not enter Tracking Station, VAB

Can enter Astronaut Complex -> when exit: Astronaut-complex-music continues playing

Can exit game pressing Alt+F4 only.

(Tried 2-3 Times to restart KSP and enter diffenrent Buildings. Lauchpad and Astronaut Complex can be entered, other buildings can not be entered).

Mods installed:

Karbonite 0.5.0 (with fixed firespitter dll)

KAS 0.4.10

Kerbal Alarm Clock 3.0.6.0

MechJeb2 2.4.1.0

SCANsat 8.1

Reproduction steps:

Start KSP

Load Savegame

Leftklick on Tracking Station

Logs and Save:

home.arcor.de/luecke_online/ksp/savegame_logfiles.zip

I built a Spacecraft "Ike Station 1" (it's saved in VAB directory) and flew it to Ike orbit, decoupled the lander and landed on Ike.

During flight it was impossible to quicksave, it was impossible to switch to another ship on the map and it was impossible to go to Space Center.

But I continued the mission, landed on Ike, transmitted all Science.

Then I tried to go to Space Center, it didn't work. I watched the debug-menu

The debug menu showed many, many "NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object" errors.

I quit the game via Alt+F4.

After reloading I couldn't continue the game (see above).

I'm having a very similar issue, I can't enter the VAB or SPH, whenever I enter any other building I am stuck there- I checked the debug output and I'm seeing this error: [Error]: ScenarioModule is null.

This started when I created a ship and I got some error when I put it on the launch pad

I am having what sounds like the same issue. On the launch of my first station, my persistent save becomes corrupted. If I manage to get back to KSC, I can enter the contracts or astronaut buildings, but cannot then to the KSC scene. I'm using all of the mods you are, Perry, and then some, so I downloaded your save game hoping that there was a bugged part that we had in common. No such luck; all of the parts that we are both using are stock or MechJeb.

I did, however, have the following successes:

1) By pressing escape from the KSC scene, I managed to load your quicksave file. It is safe and uncorrupted. I've noticed in my own game that the first sign of corruption is that I cannot quicksave, but I recommend backing this up anyway before proceeding.

2) Having loaded the quicksave, I launched the Ike Station 1 craft and achieved a stable orbit. From there, I was able to return to KSC and enter buildings. I do not believe this ship is a problem.

To anyone else having this problem, I recommend loading your quicksave as I mentioned above, then rebuilding your craft.
